title: Did Apple Just Cancel The iPhone X?
description: The iPhone X is the latest Apple flagship device. Some speculation has emerged regarding it's continued existence. Apparently, the iPhone X could be replaced by larger options said to be more appealing to certain markets. If the current generation iPhone X is halted it would mark the first time since iPhone 5C that an iPhone model was terminated after one generation.  Forbes article on potential iPhone X cancelation.
